roleset.name: to separate, break up
roleset.note: PART-V NOTES: Frames file for 'part' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. Comparison with 'separate'. (from part.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: part with
example.text: [Soviet firms that [*T*-1] hold some]-2 are unwilling [*-2] to part with it , and joint ventures are n't yet allowed [*-3] to participate .
